text: Leonard Irving Cassidy (November 18, 1919 - January 30, 2007) was a Canadian football player who played for the Toronto Argonauts. He won the Grey Cup with Toronto in 1945, 1946 and 1947. ==References== Category:1919 births Category:Sportspeople from Toronto Category:Saskatchewan Roughriders players Category:Toronto Argonauts players Category:Grey Cup champions Category:2007 deaths Category:Sportspeople from Kawartha Lakes Category:Players of Canadian football from Ontario
title: Len Cassidy
